snippet: Rick Santorum sharply criticized potential rivals for the Republican presidential nomination, indicating he intends to reclaim conservative primary voters ahead of a new White House bid.
abstract: Rick Santorum moves to shore up support among conservative primary voters ahead of expected presidential bid, harshly criticizing potential rivals for Republican nomination; questions conservatism of Mike Huckabee and dismisses achievements of first-time Senators Rand Paul and Ted Cruz.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum sharply criticized potential rivals for the Republican presidential nomination, indicating he intends to reclaim conservative primary voters ahead of a new White House bid.

headline.main: Santorum Criticizes Potential G.O.P. Rivals as ‘Bomb Throwers’
headline.print_headline: Santorum Criticizes Potential Rivals as ‘Bomb Throwers’
